00002 //
00003 // wxProcess2Events: wxProcess2EndedEvent, wxProcess2StdOutEvent, &
00004 //                           wxProcess2StdErrEvent
00005 //
00006 // Notes:  All of these are _very_ similar.  But, I have chosen to 
00007 //           split them into separate classes so that the any of them
00008 //           can be ignored by a listener, but not attaching
00009 //
00010 // ToDo: I should have an EndStatus in the EndedEvent (like wxProcessEvent)
00011 //
00013 
00014 #ifndef __WXPROCESS2_EVENTS__H__
00015 #define __WXPROCESS2_EVENTS__H__
00016 
00017 #include <wx/process.h>
00018 #include <wx/event.h>
00019 
00020 // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00021 // wxProcess2EndedEvent
00022 // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00023 DECLARE_EVENT_TYPE(wxEVT_PROCESS2_ENDED, wxID_ANY)
00024 
00025 
00026 class wxProcess2EndedEvent : public wxEvent
00027 {
00028     public:
00029         wxProcess2EndedEvent(long pid);
00030         long GetPid();
00031         virtual wxEvent *Clone() const { return new wxProcess2EndedEvent(*this); }
00032 
00033     public:
00034         long m_long_pid;
00035 
00036 };
